column2: Sky Sources: #JoseMourinho agrees personal terms with #ManchesterUnited but outstanding issues must be resolved before a contract is signed
#BillCosby has been ordered to stand trial in #Pennsylvania in a sex-assault case stemming from 2004
AFP: Russian athletics federation says athletes with previous doping offences will be barred from Rio
AFP: #Russia says 14 athletes who competed in the 2008 Olympics have tested positive in the latest round of drug tests
Liverpool & Manchester United fined ?40,000 (?30,565) each by UEFA ethics body for illicit chants by supporters at their Europa League ties
Burt Kwouk who was best known for playing #CatoFong in the #PinkPanther films has died at the age of 85
